fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit someone at night. They will be notified you visited them and nothing else.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If someone says your full username or pings you specifically in a day chat, they will be dealt a Basic attack at the end of the following night.
- Once you win, you can post images of grapes in <#970059745807437876>. (You can't post anything besides grapes, and will lose the game if you do so, even if you already won.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have two people notice you by activating your attribute.
